doc.title: Ghost Hunting: World of the Weird
doc.plot: Professional ghost hunters investigate the 'haunted' Battleship North Carolina. The night watchman aboard the ship tells his ghost stories as this doc enters the world of the weird. Includes interviews with President of Skeptics Club, leader of Paranormal Investigation Research Group, and the night watchman who sees ghosts. This doc takes you into the world of professional ghost hunting with a serious and humorous yet endearing look at the people who take ghost hunting for a serious job, not just a hobby.
